extension_description.message: Try out Piwik, the open source, privacy aware web analytics software, without the need to modify anything.
extension_description.description: a short description shown in the extension list; should be pretty short, but descriptive

extension_firefox_description.description: longer description text for firefox extension page; can use HTML to stucture the content

extension_chrome_description.description: longer description text for chrome extension page; can't use any formatting

extension_tags.message: piwik, analytics, javascript, debugging, injecting, open source,

extension_screenshot_1.message: Add the piwik tracking code to every website without access to the website source

host_title.message: List of websites modified by your custom js

placeholder_javascript.message: // Here You can type your custom JavaScript...
placeholder_javascript.description: placeholder for javascript editor (needs to be a valid comment)

delete_warning.message: Do you really want to delete all data for this host?
delete_warning.description: confirmation message when deleting the js for a host

error_message.message: It seems like this page cannot be modified

draft_remove_title.message: This is a draft, click to remove it
draft_remove_title.description: title text of draft remove button

goto_host.description: when a host that is currently not opened, a button apears for opening this host in the current tab

goto_host_title.description: message if a currently not opened webpage is opened

piwik_url_title.description: title text of piwik URL input

piwik_url_placeholder.description: placeholder text of piwik URL input

site_id_title.description: title text of site ID input

site_id_placeholder.description: placeholder text of site ID input
